    • GameController

      public GameController(int gameID, int numberOfPlayers)
      Constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      gameID - the ID of the game
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method is called when the thread is started. It continuously checks for disconnections of players by verifying the freshness of their pings.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • checkForDisconnections

      public void checkForDisconnections()
      Checks if any player is disconnected by verifying the freshness of their pings. If a player's ping is expired, handle their disconnection.

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection(Ping ping, Listener listener)
      Handles the disconnection of a player by removing them and notifying the system.
      Parameters:
      ping - the ping of the player
      listener - the listener of the player

    • addPing

      public void addPing(String nickname, Listener listener)
      Adds a Ping to the list of pings to monitor player connections.
      Specified by:
      addPing in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname associated with the ping
      listener - the player's Listener associated with the ping

      Parameters:
      nick - the player's nickname
      listener - the player's Listener
      disconnectAction - the action to perform during disconnection

      Parameters:

    • placeStarterCard

      public void placeStarterCard(String nick, Orientation o) throws GameEndedException, RemoteException
      This method places the starter card in the first round of the game. Note that, based on the rules, we need to call the end of our turn after calling this method
      Specified by:
      placeStarterCard in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nick - the player which place the card
      o - the orientation of the card
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the game has already ended
      RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String player_nickname, int index) throws GameEndedException
      Draw a card from the deck in commonBoard. It also incorporates the logic of the game with respect to the game dynamic, since it calls (through myTurnIsFinished) the nextTurn method in Model
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      player_nickname - the nickname of the player
